Reviews.Title: “Exactly as stated in description”
Reviews.Author: Amanda F Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: nice hotel exactly described nice clean comfortable bathroom bathshower surprise paris lift 4 breakfast continental value money dearer local coffee shop lovely quiet round corner metro station eiffel tower sticking head window lower floors spare pillows wardrobe luggage left cost reception day departure meant enjoyed day returned collect airport

Reviews.Title: “Great place, not so great location.”
Reviews.Author: E W Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel lovely service fantastic price didnt breakfast cant comment main issue location appealing tourist holiday lowly looking close eiffel tower isnt restaurants shops

Reviews.Title: “Carina Hotel, Paris. Very close to the Eiffel Tower.”
Reviews.Author: 85Alan
Reviews.Content: decent little hotel basic clean tidy low budget locatin 5 10 minutes walk eiffel tower close underground station handy jumped train airport hour landing stood reception hotel bars resteraunts close mcdonalds eat sort food hotel due price base location travelled paris april weather hot surprised

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay but expensive”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: bedroom ensuite lovely bedroom african theme actually darker prefer bright airy understood booking booked bed breakfast breakfast included disappointing appreciated tea facilities particularly ill stay spent lot time disappointment advertised free wifi time bedroom hotel expensive including breakfast tea facilities

Reviews.Title: “Charming Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Shang_Chia
Reviews.Content: hotel mere 15 min walk eiffel tower walking distance 4 train stations convenience stores french japanese eateries block neighborhood quiet feels safe night hotel staff generously free wifi passwords enable access internet using laptop iphones clean bed comfortable

Reviews.Title: “Recommended place in Paris”
Reviews.Author: John O
Reviews.Content: location amazing 10 minute walk eiffel tower close metro station charles michels 2 minute walk lovely lady reception desk helpful pleasant checked ready arrived checkin time comfortable 2 adults short stay clean cosy recommended friends hs disapointed

Reviews.Title: “Peacefull Hotel in Paris !”
Reviews.Author: Choupito
Reviews.Content: hi discovered peacefull hotel paris near effel tower fast access paris center metro nice charming hotel self service breakfast near hotel lot restaurants shops commerce street regards david

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised for a second time”
Reviews.Author: SpachNZ
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel husband september 2009 recent business trip paris decided return hotel hotel tidy clean bathroom size bedroom received warm welcome receptionist breakfast simple sufficient reception staff speak english able location 5 mins charles michels metro station easy paris walk eiffel tower 15 mins

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Alexia02
Reviews.Content: nice roomsmall norm paris surprised bathroom lots hot water shower extremely clean breakfasts nice hotel provide computers internet access definitely stay am paris

Reviews.Title: “Hot, unclean hotel and not good value for money”
Reviews.Author: raj_arian52
Reviews.Content: dirty narrow hot hotel stayed 5 nights stay pleasant stayed renovated 20 bed cover filthy stitched properly extra blanket dust blanket spread bed spotted breakfast simple croissant juice butter jam tea coffee fruits supply bakery inadequate wait 20 mins croissant housekeepers beds top chunky tv 23 channels complementary toiletries inadequately supplied reception staffs helpful speak english properly lifts can’t fit 2 people time paid 126 euro night service return poor hotel near metro station toilet newly renovated 25 mins walk eiffel tower recommend hotel hotel price please stay

Reviews.Title: “Dingy, dirty, shabby- what a disappointment!”
Reviews.Author: ClaireMiller
Reviews.Content: booked hotel reviews trip advisor walked stay immediately looked hotel dont hotel earned reviews unless 1 bad hotel rarely rented looked 50 wallpaper faded discolored looked mold corners closet pulled wall displaying hole wall carpet tattered bed lumpy mold bathroom shower desk clerk polite hotel location recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Location and Clean”
Reviews.Author: cheddyanne
Reviews.Content: stayed friend days location walking various sights comfortable clean breakfast disappoinment wifi advertised apparently hurry fix value money stay

Reviews.Title: “Should be 3*, very comfy, very clean, great stay”
Reviews.Author: Poderosa_83
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights pleasant stay beds comfortable bathrooms looked newly fitted modern little hot weather particularly hot 35 plus probably bit 10 mins walk eiffel tower 5 metro station future am

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: jennibub
Reviews.Content: stayed nights rate hotel highly feel welcome english speaking staff reception reasonable size heard horror stories regarding hotel completely adequate people wardrobe space shelving house clothing bathroom size fitted shower towels changed daily tidied cleaned daily wifi access free passcode reception required 24h access hotel walking distance eiffel tower tower look closer actually metro 3 4 min walk using metro easy reach famous landmarks 20 minutes time return paris staying

HotelInfo.Name: Carina Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 9, rue de Ginoux | 15th Arr., 75015 Paris, France
